body.p: We whose names are hereto attached respectfully represent to his Excellency Govenor Magoffin that Francis W Downs ^is^ in the county Jail of Nelson County confined for the term of fifteen days from & after the 30 March 1861. for a Breach of the peace He has a wife & one child depending upon his daily toil for support & knowing Downs to be a clever man and this Breach of the peace being the only thing Whereof we his neighbors ever knew him to be guilty & knowing that his family must Suffer on account of his imprisonment & that the present time is all important with him to pitch his crop for the coming season, we respectfully ask that he be released & his fine which is $15.00 be remitted He is a poor man & $15.00 which to some persons would be insignificant is to him more money than he can spare from the support of his family -- we make this petition not at his request & without his knowledge & in order that he may be enabled to go home to his family where he is needed indeed

J A Hagan
